name: Dawn Wings Necrozma GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Invasion
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Flash
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Moon’s Eclipse GX
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent. Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
